items.name: chunk
items.title: Chunk
items.description: Splits an array into multiple arrays, each containing a maximum of 'chunkSize' elements.

items.name: deep-partial
items.title: DeepPartial
items.description: A utility type that recursively makes all properties of a type optional, including nested objects, arrays, Maps, and Sets.

items.name: deep-key-paths
items.title: DeepKeyPaths
items.description: A utility type that extracts all nested key paths from an object type as a union of string literals, including array indices in both dot and bracket notation.
